plugins.healthSharePermission: HealthVis needs access to read your health data to show vital signs.
plugins.healthUpdatePermission: HealthVis needs access to write health data.
plugins.healthClinicalHealthRecordsSharePermissi: Allow HealthVis to read clinical health records.

infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: HealthVis reads your steps, heart rate, and glucose to show health summaries.
